template_input_params.description: A unique stack id.

template_input_params.description: A unique stack name.

template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.description: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate
template_input_params.label: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_das_password
template_input_params.description: DB2 Administration Server (DAS) password
template_input_params.label: DB2 DAS user password - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_das_username
template_input_params.description: DB2 Administration Server (DAS) username
template_input_params.label: DB2 DAS username - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_fcm_port
template_input_params.description: The port for the DB2 Fast Communications Manager (FCM).
template_input_params.label: DB2 FCM port - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 60000 and 69998.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_base_version
template_input_params.description: The base version of DB2 to install. Set to none if installing from fix package.
template_input_params.label: DB2 base version - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_codeset
template_input_params.description: Codeset is used by the database manager to determine codepage parameter values.
template_input_params.label: DB2 codeset - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow codesets defined in https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0/com.ibm.db2.luw.admin.nls.doc/doc/r0004565.html.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_collate
template_input_params.description: Collate determines ordering for a set of characters.
template_input_params.label: DB2 collate - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_port
template_input_params.description: The port to connect to the DB2 instance.
template_input_params.label: DB2 connection port - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 50000 and 59999.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_data_path
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 database data path.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database data path - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_NEWLOGPATH
template_input_params.description: The path to be used for database logging.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database log path - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_name
template_input_params.description: The name of the database to be created.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database name - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 alphanumeric characters starting withnot a number or the letter sequences SYS, DBM, or IBM.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_path
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 database path.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database path - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: This parameter indicates whether the database user is stored in LDAP. If the value set to true, the user is not created on the operating system.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user LDAP - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_access
template_input_params.description: The database access granted to the user. Example: DBADM WITH DATAACCESS WITHOUT ACCESSCTRL
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user access - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_gid
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the operating system group for database users.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user group name - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_home
template_input_params.description: The DB2 database user home directory.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user home directory - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_name
template_input_params.description: The user name to be granted database access.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user name - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the database user name.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user password - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_FAILARCHPATH
template_input_params.description: The path to be used for archiving log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 failover log archive path - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_groupname
template_input_params.description: The group name for the DB2 fenced user.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced group name - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the DB2 fenced username.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced user password - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_username
template_input_params.description: The fenced user is used to run user defined functions and stored procedures outside of the address space used by the DB2 database.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced username - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_fp_version
template_input_params.description: The version of DB2 fix pack to install. If no fix pack is required, set this value the same as DB2 base version.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fix pack version - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The directory to install DB2. Recommended: /opt/ibm/db2/V<db2_version>
template_input_params.label: DB2 installation directory - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_dir
template_input_params.description: The DB2 instance directory stores all information that pertains to a database instance.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance directory - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_groupname
template_input_params.description: The group name for the DB2 instance user.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance group name - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_prefix
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 instance prefix
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance prefix - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 alphanumeric characters starting withnot a number or the letter sequences SYS, DBM, or IBM.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_type
template_input_params.description: The type of DB2 instance to create.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance type - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the DB2 instance username.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance user password - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_username
template_input_params.description: The DB2 instance username controls all DB2 processes and owns all filesystems and devices.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance username - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGFILSIZ
template_input_params.description: Specifies the size of log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 log file size - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 4 and 16777152 or using default.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_pagesize
template_input_params.description: Specifies the page size in bytes.
template_input_params.label: DB2 page size - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGARCHMETH1
template_input_params.description: Specifies the media type of the primary destination for logs that are archived.
template_input_params.label: DB2 primary log archive method - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGSECOND
template_input_params.description: Specifies the number of secondary log files that are created and used for recovery log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 secondary log files - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between -1 and 254 or using default.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_territory
template_input_params.description: Territory is used by the database manager when processing data that is territory sensitive.
template_input_params.label: DB2 territory - DB2WASNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow two upper-case letters and a special case (Lat) as defined in https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0/com.ibm.db2.luw.admin.nls.doc/doc/r0004565.html.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_dns_servers
template_input_params.description: DNS servers for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_dns_suffixes
template_input_params.description: Name resolution suffixes for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_root_disk_keep_on_remove
template_input_params.description: Delete template disk volume when the virtual machine is deleted
template_input_params.label: Delete template disk volume when the virtual machine is deleted - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_domain
template_input_params.description: Domain Name of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Domain Name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_access_token
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_service
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Service
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Service

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo
template_input_params.description: IBM Software  Installation Manager Repository URL (https://<hostname/IP>:<port>/IMRepo)
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Installation Manager Repository

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_password
template_input_params.description: IBM Software  Installation Manager Repository Password
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Installation Manager Repository Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_user
template_input_params.description: IBM Software  Installation Manager Repository username
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Installation Manager Repository Username

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_password
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Password
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Root (https://<hostname>:<port>)
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Root

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_user
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Username
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Username

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01-image
template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the admin user account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01-os_password
template_input_params.description: Operating System Password for the Operating System User to access virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Operating system password - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key value which is used to connect to a guest, used on VMware only.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key value which is used to connect to a guest, used on VMware only.

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_root_disk_size
template_input_params.description: Size of template disk volume. Should be equal to template's disk size
template_input_params.label: Root Disk Size - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Short hostname - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_root_disk_datastore
template_input_params.description: Data store or storage cluster name for target virtual machine's disks
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Datastore - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 gateway for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_ipv4_address
template_input_params.description: IPv4 address for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine IP Address - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_memory
template_input_params.description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 prefix length for vNIC configuration. The value must be a number between 8 and 32
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_network_interface_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere port group or network label for virtual machine's vNIC
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_version
template_input_params.description: The release and fixpack level of WebSphere Application Server to be installed. Example formats are 8.5.5.13 or 9.0.0.6
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server Version - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_cell
template_input_params.description: Cell name for the application server
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server cell name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_wsadmin_standalone_jvmproperty_property_value_maximum
template_input_params.description: Maximum JVM heap size
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server maximum JVM Heap Size - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_wsadmin_standalone_jvmproperty_property_value_initial
template_input_params.description: Minimum JVM heap size
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server minimum JVM Heap Size - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_server
template_input_params.description: Name of the application server
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_profile
template_input_params.description: Application server profile name
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server profile name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_java_version
template_input_params.description: The Java SDK version that should be installed with the WebSphere Application Server. Example format is 8.0.4.70
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Java SDK version - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_security_admin_user
template_input_params.description: The username for securing the WebSphere adminstrative console
template_input_params.label: WebSphere administrative user name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_security_admin_user_pwd
template_input_params.description: The password for the WebSphere administrative account
template_input_params.label: WebSphere administrative user password - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_keystorepassword
template_input_params.description: Specifies the password to use on all keystore files created during profile creation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere default keystore password - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_os_users_was_name
template_input_params.description: Operating system userid that will be used to install the product. Userid will be created if it does not exist
template_input_params.label: WebSphere installation userid - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_os_users_was_home
template_input_params.description: Home directory location for operating system user that is used for product installation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere installation userid home directory - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The installation root directory for the WebSphere Application Server product binaries
template_input_params.label: WebSphere product installation directory - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_profile_dir
template_input_params.description: The directory path that contains WebSphere Application Server profiles
template_input_params.label: WebSphere profile location - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_os_users_was_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: A flag which indicates whether to create the WebSphere user locally, or utilize an LDAP based user
template_input_params.label: WebSphere to use LDAP for authentication - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_os_users_was_comment
template_input_params.description: Comment that will be added when creating the userid
template_input_params.label: WebSphere user comment for user - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_was_os_users_was_gid
template_input_params.description: Operating system group name that will be assigned to the product installation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere user group name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere cluster to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_folder
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere folder for virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Folder Name - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
template_input_params.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type - DB2WASNode01

template_input_params.name: DB2WASNode01_resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere Resource Pool to host the virtual machine

template_output_params.name: DB2WASNode01_ip
template_output_params.label: IP Addresss
template_output_params.description: The Public and Public IP address
